channel.title: Pages on World maps of bat acoustic protocols
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on World maps of bat acoustic protocols

item.title: About
item.description: These maps are made thanks to information gathered by volunteers. If you notice errors or want to add information about protocols that are not presented, please contact: For Europe: adria.baucells (at) gmail.com and charlotte.roemer1 (at) mnhn.fr For other continents: charlotte.roemer1 (at) mnhn.fr
